name: Arrows of Time
description:
Control the time in front of you to catch arrows, then release them back at your attackers. Destroy them all to advance to the top of the ruins. See how fast you can reach the summit, and with how few hits.

Made for mini jam 112. Limitation of this game was only 3 inputs, for this game that is mouse x, mouse y, and left click.

Code/Level:  Asmondia
Models/Sound: Bryanv7
